rules.name: Photo_Yes_and_No_selected
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2) OR (3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6) OR (7 AND 8) OR (9 OR 10 OR 11)
rules.label: PhotoMedical Yes and No selected

fields.name: FinalMessage
fields.fieldText: Thanks for your application. We got it and will be in touch with all the details!

fields.name: PaymentLeadershipCamp
fields.fieldText:
The week of camp, including housing and expenses, costs $400. Scholarships, which may cover the full cost of the camp, are available through local Rotary clubs. Local clubs must be notified by the applicant and scholarship requests approved prior to May 11, 2025. If seeking scholarship funding from your local Rotary Club, you are responsible for contacting your club and requesting payment. Contact leaders@sckans.edu if you are uncertain about how to contact your local club. All payments are due by May 11, 2025.


Please make checks payable to: Rotary Youth Leadership Camp  


Send to:


Community National Bank & Trust

Attn: Rotarian, Dean Kennedy

P.O. Box 637

Winfield, KS 67156

fields.name: PaymentDiscipleship
fields.fieldText: The week of camp, including housing and expenses, costs $400. Scholarships, which may cover the full cost of the camp, may be available through local churches. Lots of students pay half and receive half from their local church. If seeking scholarship funding from your local church, you are responsible for contacting your church and requesting payment. Contact summit@sckans.edu if you are uncertain about how to contact your local church or are requesting additional financial help. All payments are due by Sunday May 11, 2025.

fields.name: How_do_you_prefer_to_be_contacted
fields.fieldText: How do you prefer to be contacted?

fields.name: How_did_you_hear_about_Summit
fields.fieldText: How did you hear about us?

fields.name: Tell_us_why_you_would_like_to_attend_the_leadership_camp
fields.fieldText: Tell us why you would like to attend the leadership camp

fields.name: How_have_you_observed_the_nominee_involved_in_ways_that_impact_your_local_church
fields.fieldText: Tell us what would you like to learn about your Christian faith during camp

fields.name: RecommendationInstructions
fields.fieldText: Please give us the name of an adult (not in your immedicate family) in your local church that can recommend you as a young person involved in their Christian faith.

fields.name: statementOfInclusion
fields.fieldText:
Southwestern College is dedicated to providing an atmosphere that nourishes the learning, growth, and personal development of each resident within an inclusive cooperative community. Southwestern strives to accommodate the needs of students to ensure a safe and comfortable living environment.


Southwestern College is highly committed to working with students to find the best living environment, yet due to limited housing options, there is no guarantee that all preferences can be met.


Options may include:

  • Live with a preferred roommate or roommate based on compatibility, not gender identity
  • Private room or a private studio
  • Private bathroom

If you have any additional questions or concerns, please feel free to contact the Director of Camps & Conferences at dir.campconf@sckans.edu or 620-229-6141

fields.name: CampInformationHeader
fields.fieldText: ﻿2025 Summer Camps for Discipleship or Leadership

fields.name: CampInformation
fields.fieldText:
Both camps will be May 27-30, 2025 (Tuesday-Friday), on the Southwestern College Campus. Deadline for signing up is Sunday, May 11, 2025. There will be no refunds, unless there is an exceptional reason.


Summit Discipleship Camp

The Summit offers space for high school sophomores, juniors and seniors to stop and listen. We provide helpful ways for them to discover God’s peace, assurance, and hope, and help them learn how to tell the difference between God’s voice and the other voices fighting for their attention. The design of the camp will allow students to have a chance to experience what Christian discipleship might look like as a college student as well as imagine what Christian discipleship might like look in a variety of vocations.


RYLA Leadership Camp

Some people may define a leader as one who is in charge of a group or activity. However, a true leader is a servant first. Rotary Leadership Summer Camp offers an opportunity to discuss the possibilities and responsibilities of being a servant leader, and highlights what Rotary is doing in different communities! Throughout the camp students will learn about themselves and others, and about motivation and teamwork. The students will discover that he or she cannot be a leader without being a servant first.

fields.name: ParticipantSignatureInstructions
fields.fieldText:
Participant Signature


I hereby acknowledge that I have read, understand, and will abide by each of the terms and conditions of this Agreement. I understand that I may seek legal counsel of my own choosing to fully explain any terms of this Agreement to me before I sign it.

fields.name: checkWaivers
fields.fieldText: Please check all waivers before continuing

fields.name: I_have_read_and_agree_to_the_Residence_Agreement_terms_and_conditions
fields.fieldText: I have read and agree to the Residence Agreement terms and conditions.

fields.name: I_have_read_and_agree_to_conduct_myself_in_accordance_with_Southwestern_College
fields.fieldText: I have read and agree to conduct myself in accordance with Southwestern College’s Camp and Conference Policies.

fields.name: I_acknowledge_that_I_have_voluntarily_elected_to_sign_up_for_a_Southwestern_Coll
fields.fieldText: I acknowledge that I have voluntarily elected to sign up for a Southwestern College summer camp and have read and agree to the Summer Camp Liability Waiver.

fields.name: CampandConferencePolicies
fields.fieldText: Camp and Conference Policies

fields.name: MedicalConsentMessage
fields.fieldText: I understand and agree that Southwestern College may not have medical personnel available at the location of the camp. In the event of any medical emergency, select your consent below:

fields.name: medicalWarning
fields.fieldText: Please select only one checkbox

fields.name: MedicalYes
fields.fieldText: I DO authorize and consent to any x-ray examination, anesthetic, medical, dental or surgical diagnosis or treatment and hospital care that Southwestern College personnel deem necessary for my safety and protection. I understand and agree that Releasees assume no responsibility for any injury, illness, or damage which might arise out of or in connection with such authorized emergency medical treatment. I further understand that in the event that I experience any condition requiring emergency medical treatment, Southwestern College may direct that I be transported to the hospital for such care.

fields.name: MedicalNo
fields.fieldText: I DO NOT authorize and consent to any x-ray examination, anesthetic, medical, dental or surgical diagnosis or treatment and hospital care that Southwestern College personnel deem necessary for my safety and protection. I understand and agree that Releasees assume no responsibility for any injury, illness, or damage which might arise out of or in connection with such authorized emergency medical treatment. I further understand that in the event that I experience any condition requiring emergency medical treatment, Southwestern College may direct that I be transported to the hospital for such care.

fields.name: PhotoVideoDetails
fields.fieldText: It is vital that summer camps keep updated records of events and an active website which may contain student's photos. Names of students will never be identified.

fields.name: PhotoWarning
fields.fieldText: Please select only one checkbox

fields.name: PhotoYes
fields.fieldText: As a condition of my participation, I DO grant Southwestern College the right to use, for promotional purposes only, any photographs of me taken by Southwestern College, its employees or agents, during my participation in the Program. I further understand and agree that Southwestern College may use (for marketing purposes) any statements or quotes attributed to me in my evaluation of the Program.

fields.name: PhotoNo
fields.fieldText: As a condition of my participation, I DO NOT grant Southwestern College the right to use, for promotional purposes only, any photographs of me taken by Southwestern College, its employees or agents, during my participation in the Program. I further understand and agree that Southwestern College may use (for marketing purposes) any statements or quotes attributed to me in my evaluation of the Program.
